author: kkolinko
msg: Remove synchronization from write(byte[]), because it is not needed there,
as write(byte[],int,int) that it delegates to is synchronized.

author: kkolinko
msg: Remove synchronization from write(byte[]), because it is not needed there,
as write(byte[],int,int) that it delegates to is synchronized.

author: kkolinko
msg: Remove unneeded &0xff in int->byte conversion from the method.
According to JLS 3rd ed ch.5.1.3, narrowing of int to byte
"simply discards all but the n lowest order bits".

author: kkolinko
